We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private Variance _var;
// In Initialize()
_var = VAR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_var.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Warm Up Period", _var.WarmUpPeriod);
    Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Period", _var.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Is Ready", _var.IsReady);
    Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Current", _var.Current);
    Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Name", _var.Name);
    Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Samples", _var.Samples);
}
# In Initialize()
self.var = self.VAR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.var.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Warm Up Period", self.var.WarmUpPeriod);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Period", self.var.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Is Ready", self.var.IsReady);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Current", self.var.Current);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Name", self.var.Name);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "VAR Samples", self.var.Samples);
